languages.text: "Вначале мне было тяжело. А затем... скажем так — твоя темная страсть оказалась заразной".
"It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."
languages.original_text: "Вначале мне было тяжело. А затем... скажем так — твоя темная страсть оказалась заразной".

traits.locale_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."
"It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."
"It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."
"It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

languages.text: “我一开始确实觉得很难接受，但后来……我只能说，你阴暗的欲望确实相当有感染力。”
languages.original_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

traits.locale_text: “我一开始确实觉得很难接受，但后来……我只能说，你阴暗的欲望确实相当有感染力。”

languages.text: «Al principio me resultó difícil, pero luego... digamos que tus oscuras pasiones son contagiosas».
languages.original_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

traits.locale_text: «Al principio me resultó difícil, pero luego... digamos que tus oscuras pasiones son contagiosas».

languages.text: « Ce n'était pas facile au début, mais... disons que votre passion obscure s'est avérée communicative. »
languages.original_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était pas facile au début, mais... disons que votre passion obscure s'est avérée communicative. »

languages.text: "Am Anfang hatte ich meine Probleme, aber dann ... sagen wir einfach, dass mich Eure dunkle Leidenschaft angesteckt hat."
languages.original_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

traits.locale_text: "Am Anfang hatte ich meine Probleme, aber dann ... sagen wir einfach, dass mich Eure dunkle Leidenschaft angesteckt hat."

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}にとって初めは難しかったが…お前の暗い情熱が伝染したことの証だと言っておこうか」
languages.original_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}にとって初めは難しかったが…お前の暗い情熱が伝染したことの証だと言っておこうか」

languages.text: "İlk başta benim için zordu ancak sonrasında... Karanlık tutkularının bulaşıcı olduğunu fark ettim diyelim."
languages.original_text: "It was difficult for me at first, and then... let's just say that your dark passion proved to be infectious."

traits.locale_text: "İlk başta benim için zordu ancak sonrasında... Karanlık tutkularının bulaşıcı olduğu ortaya çıktı diyelim."
